src:
Sexual Assault
06 Nov 2019, 16:50 by BRIEF
LAS VEGAS — A Jane Doe claims that Eagle Quest of Nevada counselor Marcelo Gellert “repeatedly raped” her and her two sisters while allegedly giving them counseling when they were minors, in Clark County Court.
